Thanks for putting a good word in for me HD-R-US i am now a trusted member, i want to say thank you m8 :)

Thanks for all the great work HD-R-US. I was wondering if you were planning on doing the new bluray for Let Me In.
willyjinkens - You're welcome, cheers. The blu-ray for Let Me In will be available in the middle of March this year, so around that time.
Excellent Quality and great movie. Just got done watching it.

Hash verified but both Alcohol 120% 2.0.1(latest) and PowerISO show it as unreadable (corrupted image).

Anyway I thought Bluray had to be at least 8Gb ISO and could be up to 25Gb.

They are 80% encryption crap filler, please rip to xvid and save us all 5 times the wasted bandwidth!
Gman1646 - in two sentences, you have proved that you know nothing about... anything. That takes some doing - well done.
once again, S+ quality. thx again.
